- Your Highlight on page 5 | Location 100-105 | Added on Monday, January 1, 2024 5:30:00 PM

In my younger and more vulnerable years my father gave me some advice that I've been turning over in my mind ever since.

1984 (George Orwell)
- Your Highlight on page 10 | Location 200-210 | Added on Tuesday, January 2, 2024 10:00:00 AM

It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.
==========
Clean Code (Robert C. Martin)
- Your Highlight on page 25 | Location 500-505 | Added on Wednesday, January 3, 2024 3:00:00 PM

Clean code is simple and direct. Clean code reads like well-written prose.
